DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate long-term safety ASP1941 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus . The second objective compare efficacy pharmacokinetics ASP1941 administer food intake .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Long-term Safety Efficacy ASP1941 Japanese Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Subject randomize either ASP1941 meal ASP1941 meal group . Subjects undergo screening period enter long-term treatment . Dosage may increase treatment period subject fulfill increase criterion investigator adjudicate impact subject safety .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient least 12 week HbA1c value 6.5 9.5 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20.0 45.0kg/m2 Type 1 diabetes mellitus patient Serum creatinine > upper limit normal Proteinuria ( albumin/creatinine ratio > 300mg/g ) Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection , genital infection Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease Severe gastrointestinal disease Proliferative diabetic retinopathy
